title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 347 - Prepayment Of Amortized Contributions By Participating Employers Pursuant To Sections 17-a And 317-a Of The Retirement And Social Security Law
content:

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 347

Statutory authority: Retirement and Social Security Law, §§11, 17, 17-a, 311, 317, 317-a

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
